China: War between Cao Cao and Zhang Xiu almost take Cao Cao's life. Cao Cao's oldest son perished in the battle, but Zhang Xiu later (199) surrendered to Cao Cao to face Yuan Shao together.
Italy: Battle of Lugdunum: Septimius Severus and Albinus met in battle at Lugdunum. Albinus committed suicide or was killed. Romanâ€“Parthian Wars: Septimius Severus sacked the Parthian capital Ctesiphon.
